value.info_text:
Channel raw magical energy into your melee attacks; each blow you land will do an additional 55, 71, 84, 95, 104 darkness damage.

The damage will improve with your Spellpower.
value.name: Shadow Combat

value2.info_text:
Channel raw magical energy into your melee attacks; each blow you land will do an additional 59, 80, 96, 110, 122 darkness damage.

The damage will improve with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Shadow Combat

value.info_text:
You guard against melee damage with a sweep of your hand. So long as you can use Gestures (Requires two free or mindstar-equipped hands), you deflect up to 9, 14, 17, 19, 21 damage (23%, 33%, 41%, 46%, 50% of your best free hand melee damage) from up to 0.0, 0.6, 1.3, 1.8, 2.3 melee attack(s) each turn (based on your cunning). Deflected attacks cannot be crits.

If Gesture of Pain is active, you also have a 4.4%, 6.1%, 7.7%, 9.1%, 11% chance to counterattack.
value.name: Gesture of Guarding

value2.info_text:
You guard against melee damage with a sweep of your hand. So long as you can use Gestures (Requires two free or mindstar-equipped hands), you deflect up to 35, 50, 61, 69, 75 damage (23%, 33%, 41%, 46%, 50% of your best free hand melee damage) from up to 0.0, 0.6, 1.3, 1.8, 2.3 melee attack(s) each turn (based on your cunning). Deflected attacks cannot be crits.

If Gesture of Pain is active, you also have a 4.4%, 6.1%, 7.7%, 9.1%, 11% chance to counterattack.
value2.name: Gesture of Guarding

value.info_text:
A terrible gloom surrounds you, affecting all those who approach to within radius 3. At the end of each game turn, those caught in your gloom must save against your Mindpower, or have a 7%, 10%, 12%, 13%, 15% chance to suffer from slowness (30%), stun or confusion (30%) for 3 turns.

The chance increases with your mind speed.

This ability is innate, and carries no cost to activate or deactivate.

Each point in Gloom talents increases your Mindpower (current total: 2, 6, 9, 12, 15).
value.name: Gloom

value2.info_text:
A terrible gloom surrounds you, affecting all those who approach to within radius 3. At the end of each turn, those caught in your gloom must save against your Mindpower, or have a 7%, 10%, 12%, 13%, 15% chance to suffer from slowness (30%), stun or confusion (30%) for 3 turns.

The chance increases with your mind speed.

This ability is innate, and carries no cost to activate or deactivate.

Each point in Gloom talents increases your Mindpower (current total: 2, 6, 9, 12, 15).
value2.name: Gloom

value.info_text:
Your left hand mutates into a disgusting mass of tentacles.

When you have your offhand empty you automatically hit your target and those on the side whenever you hit with a basic attack.

Also increases Physical Power by 30, and increases weapon damage by 25%, 36%, 44%, 50%, 57% for your tentacles attacks.

Each time you make an attack with your tentacle you gain 10 insanity.

You generate a low power psionic field around you when around 'civilized people' that prevents them from seeing you for the horror you are.

Your tentacle hand currently has these stats:

Base power: 13, 25, 34, 41, 48 - 19, 35, 47, 58, 67

Uses stat: 100% Mag

Damage type: Darkness

Mastery: Mutated Hand

Crit. chance: +3.3%, +7.4%, +10%, +12%, +14%

Attack speed: 100%
value.name: Mutated Hand

value2.info_text:
Your left hand mutates into a disgusting mass of tentacles.

When you have your offhand empty you automatically hit your target and those on the side whenever you hit with a basic attack.

Also increases Physical Power by 30, and increases weapon damage by 25%, 36%, 44%, 50%, 57% for your tentacles attacks.

Each time you make an attack with your tentacle you gain 10 insanity.

You generate a low power psionic field around you when around 'civilized people' that prevents them from seeing you for the horror you are.

Your tentacle hand currently has these stats:

Base power: 13, 25, 34, 41, 48 - 19, 35, 47, 58, 67

Uses stat: 100% Mag

Damage type: Darkness

Crit. chance: +3.3%, +7.4%, +10%, +12%, +14%

Attack speed: 100%
value2.name: Mutated Hand

value.info_text:
Also increases Physical Power by 30, and increases weapon damage by 25%, 36%, 44%, 50%, 57% for your tentacles attacks.

Your tentacle hand currently has those stats:

Base power: 13, 25, 34, 41, 48 - 19, 35, 47, 58, 67

Uses stat: 100% Mag

Damage type: Physical

Mastery: Mutated Hand

Armour Penetration: +1, +4, +7, +10, +12

Crit. chance: +3.3%, +7.4%, +10%, +12%, +14%

Attack speed: 100%
value.name: Mutated Hereragegand

value2.info_text:
Also increases Physical Power by 30, and increases weapon damage by 25%, 36%, 44%, 50%, 57% for your tentacles attacks.

Your tentacle hand currently has those stats:

Base power: 13, 25, 34, 41, 48 - 19, 35, 47, 58, 67

Uses stat: 100% Mag

Damage type: Physical

Armour Penetration: +1, +4, +7, +10, +12

Crit. chance: +3.3%, +7.4%, +10%, +12%, +14%

Attack speed: 100%
value2.name: Mutated Hereragegand

value.auto_use_warning: - will only auto use when no saturation effect exists
value.info_text:
Activate the rune to instantly dissipate the energy of your ailments, cleansing all cross tier effects and 1 physical, mental, and magical effect.

You use the dissipated energy to create a shield lasting 3 turns and blocking 0 damage per debuff cleansed (not counting cross-tier ones).

If there were only cross-tier effects to cleanse, no shield is created and the rune goes on a 75% reduced cooldown.
value.name: Rune: Shatter Afflictions

value2.auto_use_warning: - will only auto use when no saturation effect exists
value2.info_text:
Activate the rune to instantly dissipate the energy of your ailments, cleansing all cross tier effects and 1 physical, mental, and magical effect.

You use the dissipated energy to create a shield lasting 3 turns and blocking 0 damage per debuff cleansed (not counting cross-tier ones).

If there was only cross-tier effects to clean, no shield is created and the rune goes on a 75% faster cooldown.
value2.name: Rune: Shatter Afflictions

value.info_text:
Unleash your subconscious on the world around you. While active, you fire up to 1, 3, 4, 5, 5 bolts each turn (one per hostile target) that deal 66, 89, 107, 122, 136 mind damage. Each bolt consumes 5 Feedback.

Feedback gains beyond your maximum allowed amount may generate extra bolts (one bolt per 18, 16, 15, 14, 14 excess Feedback per target), but no more than 1, 3, 4, 5, 5 extra bolts per turn.

This effect is a psionic channel, increasing the range of Mind Sear, Psychic Lobotomy, and Sunder Mind to 10 but will break if you move.

The damage will scale with your Mindpower.
value.name: Mind Storm

value2.info_text:
Unleash your subconscious on the world around you. While active, you fire up to 1, 3, 4, 5, 5 bolts each turn (one per hostile target) that deal 66, 89, 107, 122, 136 mind damage. Each bolt consumes 5 Feedback.

Feedback gains beyond your maximum allowed amount may generate extra bolts (one bolt per 18, 16, 15, 14, 14 excess Feedback per target), but no more then 1, 3, 4, 5, 5 extra bolts per turn.

This effect is a psionic channel, and will break if you move.

The damage will scale with your Mindpower.
value2.name: Mind Storm

value.info_text:
Your subconscious now retaliates when you take damage. If the attacker is within range (10), you'll inflict mind damage equal to the Feedback gained from the attack or 49, 66, 79, 91, 101, whichever is lower.

This effect can only happen once per creature per turn.

The damage will scale with your Mindpower.
value.name: Backlash

value2.info_text:
Your subconscious now retaliates when you take damage. If the attacker is within range (7), you'll inflict mind damage equal to the Feedback gained from the attack or 49, 66, 79, 91, 101, whichever is lower.

This effect can only happen once per creature per turn.

The damage will scale with your Mindpower.
value2.name: Backlash

value.info_text:
Focus your mind on a single target, diverting all offensive Discharge talent effects to it for 3, 5, 6, 7, 7 turns. While this effect is active, all Discharge talents gain 31%, 43%, 52%, 59%, 66% critical power and you ignore 18%, 29%, 38%, 46%, 52% mind resistance of your targets.

If the target is killed, the effect will end early.

The damage bonus will scale with your Mindpower.
value.name: Focused Wrath

value2.info_text:
Focus your mind on a single target, diverting all offensive Discharge talent effects to it for 3, 5, 6, 7, 7 turns. While this effect is active, all Discharge talents gain 31%, 43%, 52%, 59%, 66% critical power.

If the target is killed, the effect will end early.

The damage bonus will scale with your Mindpower.
value2.name: Focused Wrath

value.info_text:
Puts targets in a radius of 1, 1, 2, 2, 2 to sleep for 3, 3, 4, 4, 4 turns, rendering them unable to act. Every 16, 22, 26, 29, 33 points of damage the target suffers will reduce the effect duration by one turn.

When Sleep ends, the target will suffer from Insomnia for a number of turns equal to the amount of time it was asleep (up to ten turns max), granting it 20% sleep immunity for each turn of the Insomnia effect.

At talent level 5 Sleep will become contagious and has a 25% chance to spread to nearby targets each turn.

The damage threshold will scale with your Mindpower.
value.name: Sleep

value2.info_text:
Puts targets in a radius of 1, 1, 2, 2, 2 to sleep for 3, 3, 4, 4, 4 turns, rendering them unable to act. Every 16, 22, 26, 29, 33 points of damage the target suffers will reduce the effect duration by one turn.

When Sleep ends, the target will suffer from Insomnia for a number of turns equal to the amount of time it was asleep (up to ten turns max), granting it 50% sleep immunity for each turn of the Insomnia effect.

At talent level 5 Sleep will become contagious and has a 25% chance to spread to nearby targets each turn.

The damage threshold will scale with your Mindpower.
value2.name: Sleep

value.info_text:
Manipulate forces on the molecular level to realign, rebalance, and synergize equipment you wear to your form and function.

The accuracy and damage of any weapon will act as if it were 15, 21, 25, 28, 32 higher. (Mindstars cannot be manipulated in this way because they are already in an ideal natural state.)

Your total armour will increase by 12, 16, 20, 22, 25 and your fatigue will decrease by 5, 8, 9, 11, 12 for each body armour and shield worn.

The effects increase with your Mindpower.
value.name: Form and Function

value2.info_text:
Manipulate forces on the molecular level to realign, rebalance, and synergize equipment you wear to your form and function.

Any weapon you wield will gain a boost of 15, 21, 25, 28, 32 to both accuracy and power. (The power is treated like an increase to your stats. Mindstars cannot be manipulated in this way because they are already in an ideal natural state.)

Your total armour will increase by 12, 16, 20, 22, 25 and your fatigue will decrease by 5, 8, 9, 11, 12 for each body armour and shield worn.

The effects increase with your Mindpower.
value2.name: Form and Function

value.info_text:
Puts targets in a radius 7 cone into a nightmarish sleep for 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 turns, rendering them unable to act. Every 16, 22, 26, 29, 33 points of damage the target suffers will reduce the effect duration by one turn.

Each turn, they'll suffer 32, 43, 52, 60, 66 darkness damage. This damage will not reduce the duration of the effect.

When Nightmare ends, the target will suffer from Insomnia for a number of turns equal to the amount of time it was asleep (up to ten turns max), granting it 20% sleep immunity for each turn of the Insomnia effect.

The damage threshold and mind damage will scale with your Mindpower.
value.name: Nightmare

value2.info_text:
Puts targets in a radius 7 cone into a nightmarish sleep for 2, 3, 4, 4, 5 turns, rendering them unable to act. Every 16, 22, 26, 29, 33 points of damage the target suffers will reduce the effect duration by one turn.

Each turn, they'll suffer 32, 43, 52, 60, 66 darkness damage. This damage will not reduce the duration of the effect.

When Nightmare ends, the target will suffer from Insomnia for a number of turns equal to the amount of time it was asleep (up to ten turns max), granting it 50% sleep immunity for each turn of the Insomnia effect.

The damage threshold and mind damage will scale with your Mindpower.
value2.name: Nightmare

value.info_text:
Sends out a blast of telepathic static in a 2, 3, 5, 6, 7 radius, inflicting 170, 231, 278, 318, 353 mind damage. This attack can brainlock affected targets.

The damage will increase with your Mindpower.
value.name: Synaptic Static

value2.info_text:
Sends out a blast of telepathic static in a 3, 4, 4, 5, 6 radius, inflicting 135, 183, 220, 252, 280 mind damage. This attack can brainlock affected targets.

The damage will increase with your Mindpower.
value2.name: Synaptic Static

value.info_text:
Puts the target into a deep sleep for 3, 4, 4, 5, 5 turns, rendering it unable to act. Every 66, 90, 108, 123, 137 points of damage the target suffers will reduce the effect duration by one turn.

When Slumber ends, the target will suffer from Insomnia for a number of turns equal to the amount of time it was asleep (up to ten turns max), granting it 20% sleep immunity for each turn of the Insomnia effect.

The damage threshold will scale with your Mindpower.
value.name: Slumber

value2.info_text:
Puts the target into a deep sleep for 3, 4, 4, 5, 5 turns, rendering it unable to act. Every 66, 90, 108, 123, 137 points of damage the target suffers will reduce the effect duration by one turn.

When Slumber ends, the target will suffer from Insomnia for a number of turns equal to the amount of time it was asleep (up to ten turns max), granting it 50% sleep immunity for each turn of the Insomnia effect.

The damage threshold will scale with your Mindpower.
value2.name: Slumber

value.info_text:
Orcs have been the prey of the other races for thousands of years, with or without justification. They have learnt to withstand things that would break weaker races.

When your life goes below 50% your sheer determination cleanses you of 3, 4, 4, 5, 5 mental debuff(s) based on talent level and Willpower. This can only happen once every 5, 9, 13, 16, 19 turns.

Also increases physical save by +12.
value.name: Hold the Ground

value2.info_text:
Orcs have been the prey of the other races for thousands of years, with or without justification. They have learnt to withstand things that would break weaker races.

When your life goes below 50% your sheer determination cleanses you of 3, 4, 4, 5, 5 mental debuff(s) based on talent level and Willpower. This can only happen once every 10 turns.

Also increases physical save by +5, +9, +13, +16, +19.
value2.name: Hold the Ground

value.info_text:
Call upon nature to regenerate your body for 12, 21, 36, 51, 66 life every turn and increase healing mod by 12%, 21%, 26%, 30%, 33% for 8 turns.

The life healed will increase with your Willpower or Constitution (whichever is higher).
value.name: Gift of the Woods

value2.info_text:
Call upon nature to regenerate your body for 10, 17, 30, 42, 55 life every turn and increase healing mod by 12%, 21%, 26%, 30%, 33% for 10 turns.

The life healed will increase with your Willpower.
value2.name: Gift of the Woods

value.info_text:
Rupture reality to temporarily open a passage to the aether, triggering 3, 3, 4, 4, 5 random arcane explosions in the target area.

Each explosion does 121, 164, 197, 226, 251 arcane damage in radius 2, and will each trigger at one turn intervals.

Subsequent casts will stack but the explosions will still only occur once per turn and will be centered at the last area targeted.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Aether Breach

value2.info_text:
Rupture reality to temporarily open a passage to the aether, triggering 3, 3, 4, 4, 5 random arcane explosions in the target area.

Each explosion does 121, 164, 197, 226, 251 arcane damage in radius 2, and will each trigger at one turn intervals.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Aether Breach

value.info_text:
Conjures a furious, raging lightning storm with a radius of 6 that follows you as long as this spell is active.

Each turn, a random lightning bolt will hit up to 1, 2, 3, 5, 6 of your foes for 1.00 to 52, 71, 85, 97, 108 damage (26, 35, 42, 49, 54 average) in a radius of 1.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Thunderstorm

value2.info_text:
Conjures a furious, raging lightning storm with a radius of 6 that follows you as long as this spell is active.

Each turn, a random lightning bolt will hit up to 1, 2, 3, 5, 6 of your foes for 1 to 52, 71, 85, 97, 108 damage (26, 35, 42, 49, 54 average) in a radius of 1.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Thunderstorm

value.info_text:
Fire a powerful beam of stone-shattering force, digging out any walls in its path up to 1, 3, 4, 5, 5 range.

The beam continues to a range of 10, affecting any creatures in its path, dealing 156, 212, 255, 291, 323 physical damage to them.

If any walls are dug, you gain 16%, 22%, 26%, 30%, 33% physical damage bonus for 6 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Pulverizing Auger

value2.info_text:
Fire a powerful beam of stone-shaterring force, digging out any walls in its path up to 1, 3, 4, 5, 5 range.

The beam continues to a range of 10, affecting any creatures in its path, dealing 156, 212, 255, 291, 323 physical damage to them.

If any walls are dug, you gain 16%, 22%, 26%, 30%, 33% physical damage bonus for 6 turns.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Pulverizing Auger

value.info_text:
Condenses ambient water on a target, freezing it for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns and damaging it for 206, 279, 336, 384, 426.

If this is used on a friendly target the cooldown is reduced by 33%.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value.name: Freeze

value2.info_text:
Condenses ambient water on a target, freezing it for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns and damaging it for 271, 367, 441, 504, 560.

If this is used on a friendly target the cooldown is reduced by 33%.

The damage will increase with your Spellpower.
value2.name: Freeze

value.info_text:
Fire a charged shot at the farthest target with your tail-mounted steamgun that pierces through your enemies, ignoring armor and dealing 186%, 213%, 234%, 252%, 268% weapon damage as lightning.

This takes no time to use.
value.name: Gauss Cannon

value2.info_text:
Fire a charged shot with your tail-mounted steamgun that pierces through your enemies, ignoring armor and dealing 186%, 213%, 234%, 252%, 268% weapon damage as lightning.

This takes no time to use.
value2.name: Gauss Cannon

value.info_text:
Fires a barrage of charged missiles from your tail-mounted steamgun at a radius 2, 2, 3, 4, 4 area, dealing 156%, 179%, 197%, 212%, 225% steamgun damage as lightning as well as dazing those within for 2 turns.

The daze chance increases with your Accuracy.
value.name: Haywire Missiles

value2.info_text:
Fires a barrage of charged missiles from your tail-mounted steamgun at a radius 2, 2, 3, 4, 4 area, dealing 156%, 179%, 197%, 212%, 225% steamgun damage as lightning as well as dazing those within for 2 turns.

The daze chance increases with your Accuracy.
value2.name: Haywire Missiles

value.info_text:
You equip an automated, shoulder mounted rocket launcher. Each turn it will launch rockets at up to 2 enemies in weapon range, dealing 40%, 48%, 55%, 60%, 65% steamgun damage as fire.

The rockets will pass harmlessly through allies, but on-hit effects triggered by them only deal 50% of their usual damage.
value.name: Rocket Pod

value2.info_text:
You equip an automated, shoulder mounted rocket launcher. Each turn it will launch rockets at up to 2, 3, 3, 4, 5 enemies in weapon range, dealing 40%, 48%, 55%, 60%, 65% steamgun damage as fire.

The rockets will pass harmlessly through allies.
value2.name: Rocket Pod

value.info_text:
Augment your rockets with highly flammable materials, causing them to burn targets for 100, 136, 163, 187, 207 fire damage over 3 turns. Subsequent shots against burning targets refresh the effect of the duration (but do not stack) and inflict 50, 68, 82, 93, 104 additional fire damage.

Targets affected by this burning that fall below 25% life enter a state of panic, giving them a 16%, 22%, 26%, 30%, 33% chance each turn to flee in terror from you.

The fire damage will increase with your Steampower.
value.name: Incendiary Powder

value2.info_text:
Augment your rockets with highly flammable materials, causing them to burn targets for 100, 136, 163, 187, 207 fire damage over 3 turns as well as reducing armor by 5, 17, 21, 23, 25. Subsequent shots against burning targets refresh the effect of the duration and inflict 50, 68, 82, 93, 104 additional fire damage.

Targets affected by this burning that fall below 25% life enter a state of panic, giving them a 17%, 27%, 34%, 40%, 46% chance each turn to flee in terror from you.

The fire damage will increase with your Steampower.
value2.name: Incendiary Powder

value.info_text:
Launch a powerful guided missile that you gain direct control over. The missile lasts for up to 2 turns, has 1000% movement speed, and evades all negative effects.

On taking any damage or when you activate it, the missile will detonate. This creates a devastating explosion in radius 2, 3, 5, 6, 7, stunning them for 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns, dealing 278, 376, 453, 518, 575 fire damage over the duration, and igniting the ground for a further 56, 75, 91, 104, 115 fire damage each turn for 5 turns.

While controlling the missile your attention is fully devoted to the task, preventing you from taking any other action and leaving you vulnerable.

Warning - the explosion will damage you!
value.name: Seeker Warhead

value.info_text:
Lock on to your target with your rocket pod for 5 turns.

While locked on your regular rocket pod attacks are disabled. However, each turn you automatically fire a rocket barrage dealing 89%, 119%, 143%, 162%, 180% increased damage at your target.

Marked targets also lose 31, 43, 52, 59, 66 defense and cannot benefit from concealment or evasion.

The defense loss will increase with your Steampower.
value.name: Lock On

value2.info_text:
Lock on to your target with your rocket pod for 5 turns.

While locked on your regular rocket pod attacks are disabled. However, each turn you automatically fire a rocket barrage dealing 89%, 119%, 143%, 162%, 180% increased damage at your target.

Marked targets also lose 31, 43, 52, 59, 66 defense and cannot benefit from concealment or evasion.

The defense loss will increase with your Steampower.
value2.name: Lock On

value.info_text:
You use your rocket pods to launch yourself into the air for 3 turns, firing a radius 2 barrage of rockets that deal 186%, 213%, 234%, 252%, 268% steamgun damage as fire in radius 2.

While flying you gain 423%, 511%, 589%, 660%, 727% movement speed, 19%, 32%, 40%, 45%, 49% chance to evade melee and ranged attacks, and can reactivate this talent at will to repeat the rocket barrage.

Using any talent other than Rocket Barrage will end this effect immediately.
value.name: Death From Above

value.info_text: You become difficult to target through the thick smog generated by your Miasma Engine. While surrounded by miasma you have a 3%, 6%, 7%, 8%, 8% chance to entirely avoid damage, increased by 1%, 2%, 2%, 2%, 3% per stack.
value.name: Smogscreen

value2.info_text: You become difficult to target through the thick smog generated by your Miasma Engine. While surrounded by miasma you have a 3%, 6%, 7%, 8%, 8% chance to entirely avoid damage, increased by 1%, 2%, 2%, 2%, 3% per increased radius stack.
value2.name: Smogscreen

value.info_text:
You mount a grenade launcher on your steamgun that launches high explosive rounds. Each time you make a basic attack with your steamgun or a heavy weapon, you fire a grenade at the target that explodes for 150%, 172%, 188%, 201%, 214% steamgun damage in radius 1, 1, 2, 2, 3.

This talent also reinforces the armor of you and your minions to give you immunity to your own grenades.

You can only fire a single grenade once every 9 turns.
value.name: Grenade Launcher

value2.info_text:
You mount a grenade launcher on your steamgun that launches high explosive rounds. Each time you fire your steamgun, you fire a grenade at the target that explodes for 186%, 213%, 234%, 252%, 268% steamgun damage in radius 1, 1, 2, 2, 3.

This talent also reinforces the armor of you and your minions to give you immunity to your own grenades.

You can only fire a single grenade once every 6 turns.
value2.name: Grenade Launcher

value.info_text:
You line your armor with explosive plating that detonates when struck. On taking a melee or ranged hit that deals more than 8% of your maximum life a plate detonates, reducing the damage taken by 17%, 27%, 34%, 40%, 45% and triggering a basic grenade attack in a radius 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 cone projected at the target dealing 25% of its usual damage.

This cannot trigger more than once per turn.

Blocking an attack with your shield will also trigger the retaliation damage, if it has not already triggered this turn.

You have up to 3 plates at a time, and regain one every 8, 7, 6, 4, 3 turns.
value.name: Reactive Armor

value2.info_text:
You line your armor with explosive plating that detonates when struck. On taking a melee or ranged hit that deals more than 8% of your maximum life a plate detonates, reducing the damage taken by 19%, 33%, 43%, 51%, 56% and triggering a grenade attack in a radius 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 cone projected at the target dealing 33%, 46%, 54%, 60%, 65% of its usual damage.

This cannot trigger more than once per turn.

You have up to 3 plates at a time, and regain one every 8, 7, 6, 4, 3 turns.
value2.name: Reactive Armor

value.info_text:
You load advanced grenades into your launcher.

Incendiary Grenade: Deals fire damage over 3 turns, increasing damage taken by 7%, 15%, 21%, 25%, 28%.

Chemical Grenade: Deals acid damage and slows targets by 12%, 21%, 26%, 30%, 33% for 3 turns.

Shock Grenade: Deals lightning damage and shocks targets for 3, 4, 4, 5, 6 turns, reducing stun and pin resistance by 50%.

In addition, your turrets now explode when destroyed, dealing 206, 279, 336, 384, 426 physical damage to enemies in radius 3.

You can only choose a single type of grenade at a time.
value.name: Sapper

value2.info_text:
You load advanced grenades into your launcher.

Incendiary Grenade: Deals fire damage over 3 turns, increasing damage taken by 7%, 15%, 21%, 25%, 28%.

Chemical Grenade: Deals acid damage and slows targets by 12%, 21%, 26%, 30%, 33% for 3 turns.

Shock Grenade: Deals lightning damage and shocks targets for 3, 4, 4, 5, 6 turns, reducing stun and pin resistance by 50%.

You can only choose a single type of grenade at a time, and this grenade will not be triggered by your Reactive Armor.
value2.name: Sapper

value.info_text:
You load a magazine of 3, 3, 4, 4, 5 grenades into your launcher, causing your next 3, 3, 4, 4, 5 shots to fire a random grenade type in place of your usual Grenade Launcher, dealing 50% of the usual grenade damage.

While the magazine is loaded your attack speed is increased by 20%, 36%, 45%, 50%, 54%.

Your Grenade Launcher talent must be on cooldown to use this talent, and the magazine will only last for 6 turns.
value.name: Barrage

value2.info_text:
You load a magazine of 3, 3, 4, 4, 5 grenades into your launcher, causing your next 3, 3, 4, 4, 5 shots to fire a random grenade type in place of your usual Grenade Launcher.

While the magazine is loaded your attack speed is increased by 20%, 36%, 45%, 50%, 54%.

Your Grenade Launcher talent must be on cooldown to use this talent, and the magazine will only last for 6 turns or until you equip a Heavy Weapon.
value2.name: Barrage

value.info_text:
You link your weapons and shield to your steam generators, using them to load ammunition and improve the power of your weapons.

Each time you fire your Steamgun, you have a 34%, 58%, 69%, 75%, 80% chance to reload 1 Heavy Weapon ammo.

Each time you fire a Heavy Weapon you reload 1, 1, 2, 3, 3 ammo.

Each time you raise your shield to block, you reload 1 Heavy Weapon ammo.

This also increases weapon damage by 33%, 48%, 58%, 67%, 76% and Physical Power by 30 when using steamguns or heavy weapons.

In addition, your steamgun and heavy weapon shots now bypass friendly targets harmlessly.
value.name: Autoloader

value2.info_text:
You link your weapons to your steam generators, using them to load ammunition and improve the power of your weapons.

Each time you fire your Steamgun, you have a 34%, 58%, 69%, 75%, 80% chance to reload 1 Heavy Weapon ammo.

Each time you fire a Heavy Weapon you reload 1, 1, 2, 3, 3 ammo.

This also increases weapon damage by 33%, 48%, 58%, 67%, 76% and Physical Power by 30 when using steamguns or heavy weapons.

In addition, your steamgun and heavy weapon shots now bypass friendly targets harmlessly.
value2.name: Autoloader

value.info_text:
Prepare a defensive device that stores an electrical charge for 8 turns.

If your life falls below 0 while the AED is active it will activate to shock you back into life, negating the triggering attack, restoring 350, 474, 571, 652, 725 life and dealing 220, 298, 359, 411, 456 lightning damage in radius 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 that dazes affected enemies for 3 turns.

If the AED does not activate, the cooldown is reduced by 15 turns.

The healing and damage will increase with your Steampower.
value.name: AED

value2.info_text:
Prepare a defensive device that stores an electrical charge for 5 turns.

If your life falls below 0 while the AED is active it will activate to shock you back into life, negating the triggering attack, restoring 277, 376, 452, 517, 575 life and dealing 220, 298, 359, 411, 456 lightning damage in radius 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 that dazes affected enemies for 3 turns.

If the AED does not activate, the cooldown is reduced by 15 turns.

The healing and damage will increase with your Steampower.
value2.name: AED

value.info_text:
You gain the ability to equip one of 3 heavy weapons listed below, temporarily granting you a special attack. Heavy weapons are significantly more powerful than a steamgun, but require heavy ammunition to fire. You can store up to 5 ammunition at a time, and regenerate 1 every 3 turns while a heavy weapon is not equipped.

Flamethrower: An incendiary device which projects streams of liquid flame at your foes. Deals 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157% steamgun fire damage over 3 turns to those in radius 5. The flamethrower ignores armor, always hits, and counts as a steamgun shot for the purpose of on-hits.

Shockstaff: An electrically charged baton wielded in close combat. Deals 186%, 213%, 234%, 252%, 268% lightning damage to enemies in a frontal arc, as well as reducing the damage they deal by 11%, 17%, 22%, 25%, 28% for 3 turns. This counts as a melee attack but triggers ammunition on-hit effects. All shockstaff attacks will also make a shield attack for the same damage as lightning. You can charge up to your steamgun's range to make shockstaff attacks.

Boltgun: A multi-barreled steamgun that launches efficient, chemical infused bolts. Fires twice for 85%, 96%, 104%, 110%, 117% steamgun acid damage and generates 3, 4, 5, 6, 7 steam per hit.

The damage dealt by your Heavy Weapons is based off your currently equipped ammunition, and are treated as Steamguns for the purposes of weapon mastery talents and other effects.

Firing your Steamgun will immediately unequip your heavy weapon.
value.name: Heavy Weapons

value2.info_text:
You gain the ability to equip one of 3 heavy weapons listed below, temporarily granting you a special attack. Heavy weapons are significantly more powerful than a steamgun, but require heavy ammunition to fire. You can store up to 5 ammunition at a time, and regenerate 1 every 3 turns while a heavy weapon is not equiped.

Flamethrower: An incendiary device which projects streams of liquid flame at your foes. Deals 100% fire damage over 3 turns to those in radius 5. The flamethrower ignores armor, has perfect accuracy, and deals 282, 298, 308, 314, 319 to 395, 418, 431, 440, 446 damage.

Shockstaff: An electrically charged baton wielded in close combat. Deals 100% lightning damage enemies in a frontal arc, as well as reducing the damage they deal by 11%, 17%, 22%, 25%, 28% for 2 turns. The shockstaff deals 328, 345, 354, 361, 365 to 459, 483, 496, 505, 511 damage, and has high armor penetration and critical chance.

Boltgun: A multi-barreled steamgun that launches high velocity, chemical infused bolts. Fires twice for 100% acid damage, as well as reducing all saves by 22, 29, 35, 41, 45 for 5 turns. The boltgun deals 162, 170, 175, 178, 181 to 227, 238, 245, 250, 254 damage and has high accuracy and armor penetration.

The damage dealt by your Heavy Weapons will increase with your Cunning, and are treated as Steamguns for the purposes of weapon mastery talents.
value2.name: Heavy Weapons

value.info_text:
Your advanced training unlocks specialised techniques, triggering an effect based on your current heavy weapon at the cost of 1 heavy weapon ammunition.

Flamethrower: Sweep your flamethrower across the ground, dealing 123%, 135%, 144%, 150%, 156% steamgun damage as fire and raising a length 7 wall of fire for 5 turns. Those inside the wall take 59, 80, 96, 110, 122 fire damage and have their fire resistance reduced by 18%, 27%, 32%, 35%, 37% for 2 turns.

Shockstaff: Slam your staff into the target, creating a radius 3 shockwave that deals 148%, 162%, 173%, 181%, 187% steamgun damage as lightning and stuns those within for 3, 3, 4, 5, 5 turns.

Boltgun: Fire 4 boltgun shots dealing 29%, 32%, 34%, 36%, 37% steamgun damage as acid and disarming the target for 5 turns.

The damage dealt by the fire wall and the chance to apply effects will increase with your Steampower.
value.name: Heavy Weapon Expertise

value2.info_text:
Your advanced training unlocks specialised techniques, triggering an effect based on your current heavy weapon at the cost of 1 heavy weapon ammunition.

Flamethrower: Sweep your flamethrower across the ground, dealing 100%, 122%, 138%, 151%, 164% weapon damage as fire and raising a length 3, 5, 7, 7, 9 wall of fire for 3, 3, 4, 5, 5 turns. Those inside the wall take 59, 80, 96, 110, 122 fire damage and have their fire resistance reduced by 18%, 27%, 32%, 35%, 37% for 2 turns.

Shockstaff: Slam your staff into the target, creating a radius 3 shockwave that deals 200%, 222%, 238%, 251%, 264% weapon damage as lightning and stuns those within for 3, 3, 4, 5, 5 turns. If they are out of melee range, you can charge up to 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 tiles towards them.

Boltgun: Fire an explosive bolt that deals 337%, 385%, 423%, 454%, 482% weapon damage as acid in radius 2, 2, 3, 4, 4, randomly blinding or disarming those within for 6 turns.

The damage dealt by the fire wall and chemical cloud and the chance to apply their effects will increase with your Steampower.
value2.name: Heavy Weapon Expertise

value.info_text:
You augment your shield with your heavy weapon technology, causing an effect when you Block with a heavy weapon equipped.

Flamethrower: Vent choking, burning smoke in an area of the same radius as your flamethrower. Enemies caught within take 200%, 222%, 238%, 251%, 264% shield damage as fire and are silenced for 3, 3, 4, 5, 5 turns.

Shockstaff: Sheathe your shield in lightning and attack all enemies in radius 3, dealing 327%, 380%, 420%, 454%, 485% shield damage as lightning and gaining a barrier absorbing an amount of damage equal to 100% of the highest damage dealt for 6 turns.

Boltgun: Fire a blast of flechettes from your shield at all enemies in radius 7, dealing 70%, 83%, 92%, 101%, 108% shield damage as acid. 4, 7, 10, 12, 14 flechettes remain embedded in each target for 6 turns, and when struck by a melee or ranged attack a flechette will detonate and cause acid damage equal to 50% of the shield damage dealt.

These attacks will not trigger Counterstrike.

The chance to silence will increase with your Steampower.
value.name: Automated Defenses

value2.info_text:
Your skill with heavy weapons allows you to augment your defenses based on your current heavy weapon.

Flamethrower: Vent smoke from your flamethrower that obscures your position, giving you 17%, 25%, 30%, 35%, 39% chance to evade melee and ranged attacks.

Shockstaff: Sheathe yourself in a protective field of lightning, increasing armor by 22, 29, 35, 41, 45 and giving you a 13%, 25%, 33%, 40%, 46% chance on taking damage from an adjacent enemy to shock them for 50% staff damage as lightning (up to once per turn per target).

Boltgun: Each time your boltgun fires it injects you with a beneficial form of its chemicals, restoring 52, 70, 84, 97, 107 life and reducing the duration of a random negative physical effect by 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 turns.

The armor and healing will increase with your Steampower.
value2.name: Automated Defenses

value.info_text:
Push your heavy weapon beyond its normal limits to trigger a powerful effect. This will immediately disable your heavy weapon and expends all remaining ammunition.

Flamethrower: Detonate your fuel tanks, creating a radius 4 explosion that launches you to a chosen tile in range 5, 6, 8, 9, 10. Enemies caught within the explosion take 192, 260, 313, 357, 397 fire damage, and further fire damage equal to 56%, 84%, 105%, 122%, 137% of their current burning damage from the volatile fuel.

Shockstaff: Drive your staff into the ground, discharging all remaining power to deal 161%, 199%, 228%, 253%, 275% shockstaff damage as lightning in radius 2, 3, 3, 4, 5. Those struck will be knocked back 5, 7, 8, 10, 11 tiles, and if they strike a wall they will emit a static pulse dealing 135, 183, 220, 252, 280 lightning damage in radius 1 and stunning them for 5 turns.

Boltgun: Overcharge your boltgun, firing a single deadly bolt dealing 161%, 199%, 228%, 253%, 275% steamgun damage as acid in a piercing line. For each negative physical, magical, or mental effect on the target, they take an additional 6%, 12%, 16%, 20%, 23% damage (to a maximum of 33%, 62%, 84%, 102%, 119%) and the duration of each negative effect is increased by 2, 3, 3, 4, 5 turns.
value.name: Safety Override

value2.info_text:
Push your heavy weapon beyond its normal limits to trigger a powerful effect. This will immediately disable your heavy weapon and expends all remaining ammunition.

Flamethrower: Detonate your fuel tanks, creating a radius 4 explosion that launches you to a chosen tile in range 5, 6, 8, 9, 10. Enemies caught within the explosion take 192, 260, 313, 357, 397 fire damage, and further fire damage equal to 56%, 84%, 105%, 122%, 137% of their current burning damage from the volatile fuel.

Shockstaff: Drive your staff into the ground, discharging all remaining power to deal 161%, 199%, 228%, 253%, 275% weapon damage as lightning in radius 2, 3, 3, 4, 5. Those struck will be knocked back 5, 7, 8, 10, 11 tiles, and if they strike a wall they will emit a static pulse dealing 135, 183, 220, 252, 280 lightning damage in radius 1 that dazes for 2 turns.

Boltgun: Overcharge your boltgun, firing a single deadly bolt dealing 161%, 199%, 228%, 253%, 275% weapon damage as acid in a piercing line. For each negative physical or mental effect on the target, they take an additional 6%, 12%, 16%, 20%, 23% damage (to a maximum of 33%, 62%, 84%, 102%, 119%) and the duration of the negative effect is increased by 2, 3, 3, 4, 5 turns.
value2.name: Safety Override

value.info_text:
Using your Block talent surrounds you and your minions in a static barrier for 4 turns, increasing all resistances by 11%, 17%, 22%, 25%, 28%. If an enemy deals damage to you or your minions, the barrier will shock them for 70%, 83%, 92%, 101%, 108% of your shield damage.

This effect cannot damage the same target more than once per turn, and will not interact with Counterstrike.

You now also use your Cunning in place of Strength when equipping shields as well as when calculating shield damage.
value.name: Static Shock

value2.info_text:
Using your Block talent surrounds you in a static barrier for 4 turns, increasing all resistances by 11%, 17%, 22%, 25%, 28%. If an enemy deals damage to you, the barrier will shock them for 70%, 83%, 92%, 101%, 108% shield damage.

This effect cannot damage the same target more than once per turn, and will not interact with Counterstrike.

You now also use your Cunning in place of Strength when equipping shields as well as when calculating shield damage.
value2.name: Static Shock

value.info_text:
Project a radius 3 electric field from your shield lasting 3, 4, 4, 5, 6 turns. Enemies within this field will take an automatic shield strike for 70%, 83%, 92%, 101%, 108% lightning damage each turn, while allies will gain flat damage reduction equal to 19%, 33%, 43%, 51%, 56% of block value.

All damage reduced by this effect will be stored for Capacitor Discharge.
value.name: Lightning Web

value2.info_text:
Project a radius 3 electric field from your shield lasting 3, 4, 4, 5, 6 turns. Enemies within this field will take an automatic shield strike for 70%, 83%, 92%, 101%, 108% lightning damage each turn, while allies will gain flat damage reduction equal to 36%, 54%, 64%, 70%, 75% of block value.

All damage reduced by this effect will be stored for Capacitor Discharge.
value2.name: Lightning Web

value.info_text: Enhance your grenade with incapacitating chemicals that deal acid damage and reduce global speed by -2% for 3 turns.
value.name: Chemical Grenade

value2.info_text: Enhance your grenade with incapacitating chemicals that deal acid damage and reduce global speed by -2% for 6 turns.
value2.name: Chemical Grenade

value.info_text:
You replace your steamgun and attack with an incendiary device that projects streams of liquid flame at your foes.

Deals 100% steamgun damage as fire over 3 turns to enemies in radius 5.

These attacks cannot miss and ignore armor.
value.name: Flamethrower

value2.info_text:
You replace your steamgun with a mighty steampowered flamethrower to burn your foes to ash.

Equipping or unequipping the flamethrower takes no time. Firing your Steamgun will immediately unequip your flamethrower.

Effective Flamethrower Stats:

Range: 5

Net Damage: 5, 30, 89, 164, 253 - 8, 43, 124, 230, 354

Accuracy: 10, 25, 50, 75, 100

APR: 1000

Crit Chance: +0%, +0%, +15%, +30%, +45%

Uses Stats: 175% Cun
value2.name: Flamethrower

value.info_text: Fire a jet of flame, dealing 100% weapon damage as fire over 3 turns.
value.name: Flame Jet

value2.info_text: Fire a jet of flame, dealing 100% weapon damage as fire over 3 turns.
value2.name: Flame Jet

value.info_text:
You replace your steamgun and attack with a lightning-charged staff to engage in close combat.

Deals 120% steamgun damage as lightning to enemies in a frontal arc, as well as reducing the damage they deal by 3% for 3 turns. This counts as a melee attack but triggers ammunition on-hit effects. All shockstaff attacks will also make a shield slam for the same damage as lightning.

You can charge up to your steamgun's range to make shockstaff attacks.
value.name: Shockstaff

value2.info_text:
You replace your steamgun with a lightning-charged staff to engage in close combat.

Equipping or unequipping the shockstaff takes no time. Firing your steamgun will immediately unequip your shockstaff.

value.info_text:
Sweep your shockstaff, striking all enemies in a frontal arc for 120% weapon damage as lightning and reducing their damage dealt by 3% for 3 turns.

If you have a shield, you will also strike them.

While active this replaces your normal melee attack.
value.name: Stormstrike

value2.info_text:
Sweep your shockstaff, striking all enemies in a frontal arc for 100% weapon damage as lightning and reducing their damage dealt by 3% for 2 turns.

While active this replace your normal melee attack.

You can charge up to 5 tiles towards a target to use this attack.
value2.name: Stormstrike

value.info_text:
You replace your steamgun and attack with a multi-barreled bolt launcher, firing deadly chemical-infused flechettes.

Each attack fires twice for 60% weapon damage as acid and generates 0 steam per hit.

value2.name: Flechette Burst

value.info_text:
Throw a cone of flame with radius 3, dealing 100, 136, 163, 187, 207 fire damage.

The damage will increase with your Steampower.
value.name: Flamethrower

value2.info_text:
Throw a cone of flame with radius 3, dealing 170, 231, 278, 318, 353 fire damage and taunting targets.

The damage will increase with your Steampower.
value2.name: Flamethrower

Project a radius 3 vortex of superheated air, dealing 2.86, 5.11, 8.95, 13, 17 fire damage and pulling targets towards you.

The damage will increase with your Steampower.
value.name: Flame Vortex

Project a radius 3 vortex of superheated air, dealing 4.86, 8.69, 15, 22, 29 fire damage and pulling targets towards you.

The damage will increase with your Steampower.

value.info_text: Detonate your missile!
value.name: Detonate

value.info_text: Fires a barrage of rockets in radius 2, dealing 120% steamgun damage as fire.
value.name: Rocket Barrage

value.info_text: Deploy a turret mounted with a steamgun that fires at foes within range for 100% steamgun damage. The turret gains +0, +1, +2, +4, +5 Dexterity, Constitution and Cunning and 0.00 Steamgun Mastery.
value.name: Steamgun Turret

value2.info_text: Deploy a turret mounted with a steamgun that fires at foes within range for 100% steamgun damage. The turret gains +0, +1, +2, +4, +5 Dexterity, Constitution and Cunning.
value2.name: Steamgun Turret

value.info_text: Deploy a turret mounted with a flamethrower, scorching nearby targets. The turret gains +0, +1, +2, +4, +5 Dexterity, Constitution and Cunning.
value.name: Flame Turret

value2.info_text: Deploy a turret mounted with a flamethrower, scorching and taunting nearby targets. The turret gains +0, +1, +2, +4, +5 Dexterity, Constitution and Cunning.
value2.name: Flame Turret

value.info_text: Deploy a turret that emits a healing mist in radius 3. The turret gains +0, +1, +2, +4, +5 Dexterity, Constitution and Cunning.
value.name: Medic Turret

value2.info_text: Deploy a turret that emits a healing mist in radius 3. The turret gains +0, +1, +2, +4, +5 Dexterity, Constitution and Cunning.
value2.name: Medic Turret

value.info_text:
You are able to deploy turrets, stationary constructs that defend you in combat. Turrets last 10 turns, have a 20 turn cooldown, and deploying a turret places the others on a 5 turn cooldown.

You learn new turrets as you invest in this talent.

At level 1 you can use Steamgun turrets, which fire at a random target nearby for 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157% steamgun damage. These shots bypass allies.

At level 3 you can use Flame turrets, which deal fire damage to enemies in a radius 3 cone. Flame turrets gain 36, 48, 57, 64, 71 bonus armor and 30% resistance to all damage.

At level 5 you can use Medic turrets, which emit a healing mist that restores 38, 52, 62, 71, 79 life to allies and reduces the duration of newly applied detrimental effects by 13%, 27%, 37%, 46%, 53%.

This talent also increases the Dexterity, Constitution and Cunning of all Turrets by 31, 43, 52, 59, 66.

All turrets gain bonus armor equal to 1/2 your level, are immune to all detrimental effects, and inherit your increased damage, resistance penetration, Steampower, Physical Power, and Accuracy.

The stat bonus as well as the damage and healing dealt by Flame and Medic Turrets will increase with your Steampower.
value.name: Deploy Turret

value2.info_text:
You are able to deploy turrets, stationary constructs that defend you in combat. Turrets last 10 turns, have a 20 turn cooldown, and deploying a turret places the others on a 5 turn cooldown.

You learn new turrets as you invest in this talent.

At level 1 you can use Steamgun turrets, which fire at a random target nearby for 125%, 136%, 144%, 150%, 157% steamgun damage. These shots bypass allies.

At level 3 you can use Flame turrets, which deal fire damage to enemies in a radius 3 cone, as well as taunting enemies. Flame turrets gain 36, 48, 57, 64, 71 bonus armor and 30% resistance to all damage.

At level 5 you can use Medic turrets, which emit a healing mist that restores 38, 52, 62, 71, 79 life to allies and reduces the duration of newly applied detrimental effects by 13%, 27%, 37%, 46%, 53%.

This talent also increases the Dexterity, Constitution and Cunning of all Turrets by 31, 43, 52, 59, 66.

All turrets gain bonus armor equal to 1/2 your level, are immune to all detrimental effects, and inherit your damage bonuses and resist penetration.

The stat bonus as well as the damage and healing dealt by Flame and Medic Turrets will increase with your Steampower.
value2.name: Deploy Turret

value.info_text:
Deploy a defensive emplacement around you, summoning 2 guardian turrets in adjacent tiles for 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 turns. Guardian turrets redirect 18%, 32%, 42%, 51%, 58% of all damage taken by other adjacent allies (other than fellow guardian turrets) to themselves, and each is armed with a powerful turret capable of firing piercing bullets.

Guardian Turrets gain 1.30, 2.60, 3.90, 5.20, 6.50 ranks in Steamgun Mastery based on your Hunker Down talent level.
value.name: Hunker Down

value2.info_text: Deploy a defensive emplacement around you, summoning 2 guardian turrets in adjacent tiles for 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 turns. Guardian turrets redirect 18%, 32%, 42%, 51%, 58% of all damage taken by other adjacent allies (other than fellow guardian turrets) to themselves, and each is armed with a powerful turret capable of firing piercing bullets.
value2.name: Hunker Down

value.info_text: Increases the accuracy of unarmed, melee and ranged weapons by 18, 34, 46, 56, 65.
value.name: Combat Accuracy

value2.info_text: Increases the accuracy of unarmed, melee and ranged weapons by 13, 27, 40, 51, 62.
value2.name: Combat Accuracy

value.info_text: Rigorous training allows you to be more resistant to some spell effects (+16, +29, +40, +49, +57 spell save).
value.name: Spell Shield

value2.info_text: Rigorous training allows you to be more resistant to some spell effects (+11, +23, +35, +46, +58 spell save).
value2.name: Spell Shield

value.info_text:
You've learned to recover quickly from effects that would disable you. Each turn, you have a 27%, 43%, 51%, 56%, 59% chance to recover from a single stun effect.

At talent level 2 you may also recover from blindness, at level 3 confusion, level 4 pins, and level 5 disarms and slows.

Effects will be cleansed with the priority order Stun > Blind > Confusion > Pin > Slow > Disarm.

Only one effect may be recovered from each turn, and the chance to recover from an effect scales with your Constitution.
value.name: Unflinching Resolve

value2.info_text:
You've learned to recover quickly from effects that would disable you. Each turn, you have a 27%, 43%, 51%, 56%, 59% chance to recover from a single stun effect.

At talent level 2 you may also recover from blindness, at level 3 confusion, level 4 pins, and level 5 slows and wounds.

Only one effect may be recovered from each turn, and the chance to recover from an effect scales with your Constitution.
value2.name: Unflinching Resolve

value.info_text:
Allows you to use melee weapons to focus your spells, granting a 44%, 57%, 65%, 70%, 74% chance per melee attack to cast an offensive spell as a free action on the target.

Delivering the spell this way will not trigger a spell cooldown.

You may select an allowed spell to trigger this way, or choose to have one randomly selected for each attack.

While dual wielding or using a shield the chance is halved.

The chance increases with your Cunning.

Allowed spells: Earthen Missiles, Flame, Lightning
value.name: Arcane Combat

value2.info_text:
Allows you to use melee weapons to focus your spells, granting a 44%, 57%, 65%, 70%, 74% chance per melee attack to cast an offensive spell as a free action on the target.

Delivering the spell this way will not trigger a spell cooldown.

You may select an allowed spell to trigger this way, or choose to have one randomly selected for each attack.

While dual wielding or using a shield, the chance is reduced to 50% for both weapons.

The chance increases with your Cunning.

Allowed spells: Earthen Missiles, Flame, Lightning
value2.name: Arcane Combat

value.info_text:
You brace yourself for the final stand, increasing Defense and Armor by 9, 11, 13, 15, 17, maximum and current life by 196, 274, 338, 393, 444, but making you unable to move.

Your stand lets you concentrate on every blow, allowing you to avoid death from normally fatal wounds. You can only die when reaching -196, -274, -338, -393, -444 life.

If your life is below 0 when Last Stand ends it will be set to 1.

The increase in Defense and Armor is based on your Dexterity, and the increase in life is based on your Constitution and normal maximum life.
value.name: Last Stand

value2.info_text:
You brace yourself for the final stand, increasing Defense and Armor by 9, 11, 13, 15, 17, maximum and current life by 196, 274, 338, 393, 444, but making you unable to move.

Your stand lets you concentrate on every blow, allowing you to avoid death from normally fatal wounds. You can only die when reaching -196, -274, -338, -393, -444 life.

The increase in Defense and Armor is based on your Dexterity, and the increase in life is based on your Constitution and normal maximum life.
value2.name: Last Stand

value.info_text:
Equip a bandolier holding up to 6, 7, 8, 9, 10 throwing knives, allowing you to attack from range. You automatically reload 2 knives per turn while resting, or half as many while moving.

The base power, Accuracy, Armour penetration, and critical strike chance of your knives increase with talent level, and damage is improved with Dagger Mastery.

Throwing Knives count as melee attacks for the purpose of on-hit effects.

Effective Throwing Knife Stats:

Range: 4, 5, 6, 7, 7

Net Damage: 4, 11, 23, 34, 45 - 6, 16, 33, 48, 63

Accuracy: 10, 25, 50, 75, 100 (knife)

APR: 0

Crit Chance: +0%, +0%, +12%, +27%, +42%

Crit mult: 150%

Uses Stats: 50% Str, 70% Dex
value.name: Throwing Knives

value2.info_text:
Equip a bandolier holding up to 6, 7, 8, 9, 10 throwing knives, allowing you to attack from range. You automatically reload 2 knives per turn while resting, or half as many while moving.

The base power, Accuracy, Armour penetration, and critical strike chance of your knives increase with talent level, and damage is improved with Dagger Mastery.

Throwing Knives count as melee attacks for the purpose of on-hit effects.

Effective Throwing Knife Stats:

value.info_text: You know how to hit the right places, gaining +8%, +15%, +20%, +25%, +29% critical damage modifier and 6, 12, 16, 20, 23 armour penetration.
value.name: Vicious Strikes

value2.info_text: You know how to hit the right places, gaining +7%, +14%, +20%, +25%, +30% critical damage modifier and 6, 11, 16, 20, 24 armour penetration.

value.info_text:
All steamtech criticals reduce the remaining cooldown of a random steamtech talent by 1.

All spell criticals reduce the remaining cooldown of a random spell/corruption/celestial/chronomancy talent by 2.

All mind criticals reduce the remaining cooldown of a random wild gift/psionic/afflicted talent by 2.

All physical criticals reduce the remaining cooldown of a random technique or cunning talent by 2.

This can only happen once per turn per type, and cannot affect the talent that triggers it.
value.name: Eye of the Tiger

value2.info_text:
All steamtech criticals reduce the remaining cooldown of a random steamtech talent by 1.

All spell criticals reduce the remaining cooldown of a random spell talent by 2.

All mind criticals reduce the remaining cooldown of a random wild gift/psionic/afflicted talent by 2.

All physical criticals reduce the remaining cooldown of a random technique or cunning talent by 2.

This can only happen once per turn per type, and cannot affect the talent that triggers it.
value2.name: Eye of the Tiger

value.info_text:
Surround yourself with a myriad of tiny, nearly invisible, reinforcing fungi.

You gain 200, 259, 304, 341, 373 maximum life and 9, 11, 13, 15, 17 life regeneration.

The effects will increase with your Willpower.
value.name: Wild Growth

Surround yourself with a myriad of tiny, nearly invisible, reinforcing fungi.

You gain 200, 259, 304, 341, 373 maximum life and 13, 17, 20, 22, 24 life regeneration.

value.info_text: A wave of energy passes through your fungus, making it release immediate healing energies on you, healing you for 234%, 348%, 436%, 510%, 576% of your current life regeneration rate (0, 0, 1, 1, 1).
value.name: Sudden Growth

value2.info_text: A wave of energy passes through your fungus, making it release immediate healing energies on you, healing you for 430%, 560%, 690%, 819%, 950% of your current life regeneration rate (1, 1, 1, 2, 2).
value2.name: Sudden Growth

value.info_text: Alter the flow of energies of your equiped mindstars, changing their damage type between nature and mind.
value.name: Attune Mindstar

value.info_text:
Mark a creature with pheromones, signalling to all of your summons within 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 tiles to shift aggression towards the marked creature for 3, 4, 4, 5, 6 turns. Marked targets will receive 25%, 31%, 35%, 38%, 42% increased damage from your summons and your summons will change target to it.

The increased damage from your summons will increase with your Mindpower
value.name: Pheromones

value2.info_text: Mark a creature with pheromones, signalling to all of your summons within 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 tiles of it to shift aggression towards the marked creature for 3, 5, 6, 8, 9 turns.
value2.name: Pheromones
